content: So-called ‘conservatism’ in its contemporary guise seems to be so bereft of ideas and principles that its chief guiding star is to oppose whatever liberals endorse. Liberals endorse clean air and water so of course guaranteeing it is over regulation (whereas since liberals support women’s self determination, regulating what women can do with their bodies is ‘morality.’ Liberals endorse science as to global warming issues, so they endorse their interpretation of scripture and the word of oil and coal hacks.
